A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worlds and investment in visual galaxy diversity underdeveloped compared w/prequels; sacrificed threat to galaxies w/ too much focus on and fragmentation into individual journeys - but managed to salvage some in ending. Production value mediocre - where did the money go? Directing (camera\, editing) mediocre. Loved Guardians but enough quip mimicking - Star War's is the classic.  Hope JJ gets the money he needs to make a redeeming killer 3rd installment.
